getPendingValidations(uint256).details: Gets all pending validation requests for a validator

getServerValidations(uint256).details: Gets all validation requests for a server agent

getTotalRequests().details: Gets the total number of validation requests

returns.isPending: Whether the request is still pending
returns.response: The response if completed (0 if pending)

returns.isPending: Whether the request is still pending

isValidationCompleted(bytes32).details: Checks if a validation has been completed for a data hash

params.agentServerId: The ID of the server agent to validate
params.agentValidatorId: The ID of the validator agent
params.dataHash: The hash of the data to be validated

returns.requestId: The unique identifier for this validation request

params.dataHash: The hash of the data that was validated

returns.success: True if the response was recorded successfully

setValidationTimeout(uint256).details: Sets the validation timeout duration (only owner)

params.newTimeout: The new timeout duration in seconds
